Body:
ci_image = np.array([[5.0, 9.0, 8.0], [5.0, 6.0, 8.0], [5.0, 3.0, 8.0], [
    0.0, 0.0, 0.0], [5.0, 3.0, 6.0], [5.0, 6.0, 6.0], [5.0, 9.0, 6.0]])
mask = np.array([[False, False, False], [False, False, False], [False, 
    False, False], [False, False, False], [False, False, False], [False, 
    False, False], [False, False, False]])
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=10.0, regions=[(0, 3,
    0, 3), (4, 7, 0, 3)], row_slope=0.0)
mock_image = pattern.ci_pre_cti_from_ci_image_and_mask(ci_image=ci_image,
    mask=mask)
assert (mock_image == np.array([[5.0, 6.0, 7.0], [5.0, 6.0, 7.0], [5.0, 6.0,
    7.0], [0.0, 0.0, 0.0], [5.0, 6.0, 7.0], [5.0, 6.0, 7.0], [5.0, 6.0, 7.0]])
    ).all()
